channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: It's Topical
channel.desc: It's Topical gives you a sense of the nation's mood. Digital, pacy, interactive and engaging journalism brought to the TV screen.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: Unwrap Africa
channel.desc: A mix of topical news, cultural highlights and uplifting stories, with a special focus on groundbreaking technological achievements and success stories through live links to different countries and regions.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: G20 Focus
channel.desc: An in-depth and thought-provoking discussion that interrogates world leaders, thinkers and agitators about the undercurrents of the G20 issues.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: The Late Edition
channel.desc: A 360 degree view of all the stories that made headlines through packages, features, and interviews.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: OFF Air
channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet.
